title: IMCG Margalla students shine with top positions in FDE competitions
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 2 (APP): Islamabad Model College for Girls (Postgraduate), Margalla F-7/4 students made their college proud by winning first prize in the short film competition and a notable position in calligraphy at the Federal Directorate of Education (FDE) Sector-Level contests on Thursday.
Malaika Sundus, a 7th semester Mass Communication student, secured first prize in the Short Film Competition. Her short film was praised by judges for its strong message and creative work.
Jaweria from the Fine Arts Department also brought pride to the institution by winning a Consolation Prize in the Calligraphy Competition, showing her dedication and artistic skills.
Teachers and fellow students praised THE achievements, saying that Malaika’s first prize in short film and Jaweria’s success in calligraphy were proof of the college’s talent and hard work.
The administration said these victories are a matter of pride and will encourage other students to work hard and achieve success.
